mentor.name: Bear
mentor.advantage: +2 dice for tests to resist damage (not including Drain).
mentor.magician: +2 dice for health spells, preparations, and health spell rituals.
mentor.disadvantage: You might go berserk when you take Physical damage in combat or if someone under your care is badly injured. Make a Simple Charisma + Willpower Test (wound modifiers apply). You go berserk for 3 turns minus 1 turn per hit, so 3 or more hits averts the berserk rage entirely. If you're already going berserk, increase the duration. When you're berserk, you go after your attacker(s) without regard for your own safety. If you incapacitate the target(s) before the time is up, the berserk fury dissipates.

mentor.name: Cat
mentor.advantage: +2 dice to either Gynmastics or Infiltration Tetss (choose one).
mentor.magician: +2 dice for illution spells, preparations, and illusion spell reituatls.
mentor.disadvantage: Cat magicians toy with their prey. Unless you succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test at the start of comabat, you cannot make an attack that incapacitates your target. If you take any Physical damage, all this playing around stops.

mentor.name: Dog
mentor.magician: +2 dice for Detection spells, preparations, and rituals.
mentor.disadvantage: A Dog magician is stubbornly loyal. You can never leave someone behind, betray your comrates, or let another sacrifice themselves in your place without making a successful Charisma + Willpower (3) Test.

mentor.name: Dragonslayer
mentor.advantage: +2 dice pool modifier for one social skill of choice.
mentor.magician: +2 dice for Combat spells, preparations, and rituals.
mentor.adept: 1 free level of Enhanced Accuracy (skill) and 1 free level of Danger Sense.
mentor.disadvantage: If you break a promise, whether by choice or by accident, you take a -1 dice pool modifier to all actions until you make good on your promise.

mentor.name: Eagle
mentor.magician: +2 dice for summoning spirits of air.
mentor.disadvantage: Eagle magicians receive the Allergy (pollutants, mild) negative quality (p. 94; they do not receive bonus BP).

mentor.name: Fire-Bringer
mentor.advantage: +2 dice to Artisan skill tests or Alchemy skill tests (choose one).
mentor.magician: +2 dice for spells, preparations, and spell rituals in the Manipulation category.
mentor.adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability on a non-combat skill.
mentor.disadvantage: When someone sincerely asks you for help, you can't refuse without succeeding in a Simple Charisma + Willpower (3) Test.

mentor.name: Mountain
mentor.magician: +2 dice for Counterspell Tests and anchored rituals.
mentor.disadvantage: When a Mountain magician makes a plan, she sticks to it. You must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to abandon a planned course of action in favor of a new one. If you fail, you must endeavor to continue with your original plan, even if it means going on alone. Similarly, you must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to proceeed in anything without a plan.

mentor.name: Rat
mentor.magician: +2 dice to Alchmey tests when harvesting reagents, and you may use reagents of any tradition.
mentor.disadvantage: A Rat magician must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to not immediately flee or seek cover whenever caught in a combat situation. If there is nowhere to flee, then she is forced to fight.

mentor.name: Raven
mentor.magician: +2 dice for spells, preparations, and spell rituals in the Manipulation category.
mentor.adept: Free Traceless Walk and 1 level of Voice Control
mentor.disadvantage: You must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid exploiting someone else's misfortune to your own advantage or to pull a clever trick or prank even if it's to the disadvantage of your friends.

mentor.name: Sea
mentor.adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability on an athletic skill (select when receiving this bonus).
mentor.disadvantage: You must make a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to give away something you own or be charitable in some way.

mentor.name: Seducer
mentor.magician: +2 dice for spell, preparations, and spell rituals of the Illusion category.
mentor.adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability for a skill in the Acting or Influence skill group.
mentor.disadvantage: You must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid pursuing a vice or indulgence (drugs, BTLs, sex, and so on) when it is made available.

mentor.name: Shark
mentor.magician: +2 dice for spells, preparations, and spell rituals of the Combat category.
mentor.disadvantage: You might go berserk when you take Physical damage in combat. Every time it happens, make a Simple Charisma + Willpower Test (wound modifiers apply). You go berserk for 3 turns minus 1 turn per hit, so 3 or more hits averts the berserk rage entirely. If you're already going berserk, increase the duration. When you're berserk, you go after your attacker(s) without regard for your own safety. If you run out or targets before time's up, you keep attacking their bodies.

mentor.name: Snake
mentor.magician: +2 dice for spells, preparations, and spell rituals of the Detection category.
mentor.disadvantage: You must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Tests to avoid pursuing secrets or knowledge that few people know about when you receive hits of its existence.

mentor.name: Thunderbird
mentor.magician: +2 dice for summoning spirits of air.
mentor.disadvantage: A Thunderbird magician must succeed in a Charisma + Willpower (3) Test to avoid responding to an insult in kind.

mentor.name: Wise Warrior
mentor.advantage: +2 dice to all Leadership or Instruction skill tests (choose one).
mentor.magician: +2 dice for spells, preparations, and spell rituals in the Combat category.
mentor.adept: 1 free level of Improved Ability on a Combat skill.
mentor.disadvantage: If you act dishonorably or without courtesy, whether by choice or by accident, you take a -1 dice pool modifier to all actions until you atone for your behavior.

mentor.name: Wolf
mentor.magician: +2 dice for spells, preparations, and rituals in the Combat category.
mentor.disadvantage: A Wolf magician must succeed in a Willpower + Charisma (3) Test to retreat from a fight.
